entity.name: Latest updates from local US authorities regarding the coronavirus

text:
NEW: CA has 46,500 confirmed cases of #COVID19--
+3.3% from yesterday.

3,495 of those are in our hospitals--
+1.2% from yesterday.

1,186 of those are in the ICU--
+0.4% from yesterday.
 
CA is flattening the curve, but we must continue to take this seriously.
#StayHomeSaveLives
